title: NYRA faulted for poor planning
text: State Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli said Wednesday that problems with capital planning still persist for the New York Racing Association, which controls three racetracks in the state: Aqueduct, Belmont and Saratoga. The comptrollerâ€™s auditors say the NYRA lacks " adequate documentation to support its annual capital plans.
